TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrimitiveType extends System.Data.Metadata.Edm.SimpleType

Docs.summary: Describes the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] primitive types, conceptual model primitive types, and storage provider-specific primitive types.
Gets the built-in type kind for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType">.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.BuiltInTypeKind"> object that represents the built-in type kind for this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.

Docs.summary: Returns an equivalent common language runtime (CLR) type of this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType">. Note that the ClrEquivalentType property always returns a non-nullable type value.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Type"> object that represents an equivalent common language runtime (CLR) type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of facet descriptions for this <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType">.
Docs.value: A collection of type <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> that contains the list of facet descriptions for this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType GetEdmPrimitiveType() cil managed

Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"> object that is an equivalent of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.

remarks.format:
## Remarks GetEdmPrimitiveType returns the model equivalent type for this type, For example, if this instance is `nvarchar` and its base type is a conceptual model string, then the return type is a conceptual model string.
If the type is actually already a model type, then the return type is "this".

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType GetEdmPrimitiveType(valuetype System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveTypeKind primitiveTypeKind) cil managed

Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmType"> object that is an equivalent of a specified <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType> GetEdmPrimitiveTypes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the list of primitive types.
Docs.returns: A collection of type <xref:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection%601> that contains the list of primitive types.

Docs.summary: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveTypeKind"> enumeration value that indicates a primitive type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveTypeKind"> enumeration value that indicates a primitive type of this <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.PrimitiveType>.
